title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days for the District Court Area of Cork City 
Order, 2024 
This Order shall come into operation on 2nd of April 2024
text_norm: 1 order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day district court area cork city order 2024 order shall come operation 2nd april 2024

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5 

of 1961 ), is hereby amended by— 

the substitution at reference number 39 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Each Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday each month. All 
sittings at 10.30 a.m.”
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 ( s.i no 5 1961 ) hereby amended by-- substitution reference number 39 matter column (4) following monday tuesday wednesday thursday friday month sitting 10.30 a.m

text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I.

 the substitution at reference number 34 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

Each Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday each month. All sittings at
text_norm: 3 second schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended by-- substitution reference number 34 matter column (4) following monday tuesday wednesday thursday month sitting

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 10.30 a.m.”

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this 

Order had been in force at the time at which such business had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [113] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service, 

27 March, 2024. 

PAUL KELLY, 

Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to 
sign documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

DEIRDRE DOYLE, 

Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 
authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to 
section 10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [113]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days at the District Court Area of Cork 
City. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [113] 5
